page.title: 03Wed. at B'walton school
page.content: Wednesday is a school day. We get to school at{8.45a.m.}We have a{playtime until{9.00.}We go in and sit down at our tables with a book to read, sometimes we have an{assembly.}After that we have to do{Peak or English. {Peak}is{Maths}and{English}is a{card from which we have to answer questions in our books. We often have a{T.V. {programme. Playtime}is from{10.35 to {10.55}then we do more work until{12.00 {dinner time.}Some have school dinners and some packed lunches. Then it is another playtime until 1.15.We come in and do more reading and then we play{games.We play hockey,football or {small games with balls.}After games we come in and change in the cloakroom. Sometimes we have a{story}before we go {home at 3.15.
